issue.title: <frame/>: Support multiple frames in a single parent? Intended scope of frames? Use link names as frames?

content.raw:
Question 2: Currently there is no namespacing for frame names in the `pose_dom` graph, so any frame can be referenced from anywhere else, but I expect that we will change that, since we currently allow collision / visual "cousins" to have the same name (many existing sdf models have multiple links with only 1 collision / visual that are all named "collision" / "visual").

The specific example you gave currently won't pass a unit test because the `pose_dom` branch doesn't yet parse `<frame/>` tags under links, only under models. I expect this will change also.
